entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:37 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 9:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -40.6°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -44.7°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 39. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 61. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
